Rule.Description: Only "Tenured/tenure-track faculty" or "Non-tenure-track research faculty" can "Add" a "Whole Proposal"
"Teaching faculty", "Research staff", "Professional staff", "Administrator" cannot "Add" a "Whole Proposal" unless delegated by faculty;

"PI" can "View" "Investigator Information", "Project Information", "Sponsor and Budget Information", "Cost Share Information", "University Commitments", "Conflict of Interest and Commitment Information", "Compliance Information", "Additional Information", "Collaboration Information", "Proprietary/Confidential Information", "Certification/Signatures", "OSP Section", "Appendices" Sections

Match.AttributeValue: Conflict of Interest and Commitment Information

Rule.Description: "PI" can "View" proposal "Audit Log";

Match.AttributeValue: Conflict of Interest and Commitment Information

Rule.Description: "PI" can not "Edit" "OSP Section";
"PI" can "Add" "InvestigatorInformation.Co-PI" and "InvestigatorInformation.Senior-Personnel" Only;
"PI" can "Delete" both "InvestigatorInformation.Co-PI" and "InvestigatorInformation.Senior-Personnel";

"Co-PI" can "View" "Investigator Information", "Project Information", "Sponsor and Budget Information", "Cost Share Information", "University Commitments", "Conflict of Interest and Commitment Information", "Compliance Information", "Additional Information", "Collaboration Information", "Proprietary/Confidential Information", "Certification/Signatures", "OSP Section", "Appendices"

Match.AttributeValue: Conflict of Interest and Commitment Information

Rule.Description: "Co-PI" can "Edit" "Investigator Information", "Appendices" and "Certification/Signatures" Only;

"Co-PI" can not "Edit" "Project Information","Sponsor and Budget Information", "Cost Share Information", "University Commitments", "Conflict of Interest and Commitment Information", "Compliance Information", "Additional Information", "Collaboration Information", "Proprietary/Confidential Information","OSP Section" when SubmittedByPI is NOTSUBMITTED and ReadyForSubmissionByPI is false;

Match.AttributeValue: Conflict of Interest and Commitment Information

Rule.Description: "Co-PI" can "Add" Only "InvestigatorInformation.Senior-Personnel";
"Co-PI" can "Delete" "InvestigatorInformation.Senior-Personnel" Only;
"Co-PI" cannot "Add" "InvestigatorInformation.Co-PI";
"Co-PI" cannot "Delete" "InvestigatorInformation.Co-PI";

"Senior Personnel" can "View" "Investigator Information", "Project Information", "Sponsor and Budget Information", "Cost Share Information", "University Commitments", "Conflict of Interest and Commitment Information", "Compliance Information", "Additional Information", "Collaboration Information", "Proprietary/Confidential Information", "Certification/Signatures", "OSP Section", "Appendices" Section;

Match.AttributeValue: Conflict of Interest and Commitment Information

Rule.Description: "Senior Personnel" cann't "Edit" "Investigator Information", "Project Information", "Sponsor and Budget Information", "Cost Share Information", "University Commitments", "Conflict of Interest and Commitment Information", "Compliance Information", "Additional Information", "Collaboration Information", "Proprietary/Confidential Information", "Certification/Signatures", "OSP Section", "Appendices" Section;

Match.AttributeValue: Conflict of Interest and Commitment Information

Rule.Description: "Department Chair" can "View" "Investigator Information", "Project Information", "Sponsor and Budget Information", "Cost Share Information", "University Commitments", "Conflict of Interest and Commitment Information", "Compliance Information", "Additional Information", "Collaboration Information", "Proprietary/Confidential Information", "Certification/Signatures", "OSP Section", "Appendices" section;

Match.AttributeValue: Conflict of Interest and Commitment Information

Rule.Description: "Department Chair" can "Edit" "Certification/Signatures" when ApprovedByDepartmentChair= READYFORAPPROVAL

"Department Chair" cann't "Edit" "Investigator Information", "Project Information", "Sponsor and Budget Information", "Cost Share Information", "University Commitments", "Conflict of Interest and Commitment Information", "Compliance Information", "Additional Information", "Collaboration Information", "Proprietary/Confidential Information", "OSP Section", "Appendices" Section ApprovedByDepartmentChair= READYFORAPPROVAL;

Match.AttributeValue: Conflict of Interest and Commitment Information

Rule.Description: "Business Manager" can "View" "Investigator Information", "Project Information", "Sponsor and Budget Information", "Cost Share Information", "University Commitments", "Conflict of Interest and Commitment Information", "Compliance Information", "Additional Information", "Collaboration Information", "Proprietary/Confidential Information", "Certification/Signatures", "OSP Section", "Appendices" section;

Match.AttributeValue: Conflict of Interest and Commitment Information

Rule.Description: "Business Manager" can "Edit" "Sponsor and Budget Information" and "Certification/Signatures" when ApprovedByBusinessManager= READYFORAPPROVAL

"Business Manager" cann't "Edit" "Investigator Information", "Project Information", "Cost Share Information", "University Commitments", "Conflict of Interest and Commitment Information", "Compliance Information", "Additional Information", "Collaboration Information", "Proprietary/Confidential Information", "OSP Section", "Appendices" Section when ApprovedByBusinessManager= READYFORAPPROVAL;

Match.AttributeValue: Conflict of Interest and Commitment Information

Rule.Description: "Dean" can "View" "Investigator Information", "Project Information", "Sponsor and Budget Information", "Cost Share Information", "University Commitments", "Conflict of Interest and Commitment Information", "Compliance Information", "Additional Information", "Collaboration Information", "Proprietary/Confidential Information", "Certification/Signatures", "OSP Section", "Appendices" section;

Match.AttributeValue: Conflict of Interest and Commitment Information

Rule.Description: "Dean" can "Edit" and "Certification/Signatures" when ApprovedByDean= READYFORAPPROVAL

"Dean" cann't "Edit" "Investigator Information", "Project Information", "Sponsor and Budget Information", "Cost Share Information", "University Commitments", "Conflict of Interest and Commitment Information", "Compliance Information", "Additional Information", "Collaboration Information", "Proprietary/Confidential Information", "OSP Section", "Appendices" Section when ApprovedByDean= READYFORAPPROVAL;

Match.AttributeValue: Conflict of Interest and Commitment Information

Rule.Description: "IRB" can "View" "Investigator Information", "Project Information", "Sponsor and Budget Information", "Cost Share Information", "University Commitments", "Conflict of Interest and Commitment Information", "Compliance Information", "Additional Information", "Collaboration Information", "Proprietary/Confidential Information", "Certification/Signatures", "OSP Section", "Appendices" section;

Match.AttributeValue: Conflict of Interest and Commitment Information

Rule.Description: "IRB" can "Edit" and "Certification/Signatures" when ApprovedByIRB= READYFORAPPROVAL

"IRB" cann't "Edit" "Investigator Information", "Project Information", "Sponsor and Budget Information", "Cost Share Information", "University Commitments", "Conflict of Interest and Commitment Information", "Compliance Information", "Additional Information", "Collaboration Information", "Proprietary/Confidential Information", "OSP Section", "Appendices" Section when ApprovedByIRB= READYFORAPPROVAL;

Match.AttributeValue: Conflict of Interest and Commitment Information

Rule.Description: "University Research Administrator" can "View" "Investigator Information", "Project Information", "Sponsor and Budget Information", "Cost Share Information", "University Commitments", "Conflict of Interest and Commitment Information", "Compliance Information", "Additional Information", "Collaboration Information", "Proprietary/Confidential Information", "Certification/Signatures", "OSP Section", "Appendices" section;

Match.AttributeValue: Conflict of Interest and Commitment Information

Rule.Description: "University Research Administrator" can "Edit" "Investigator Information", "Project Information", "Sponsor and Budget Information", "Cost Share Information", "University Commitments", "Conflict of Interest and Commitment Information", "Compliance Information", "Additional Information", "Collaboration Information", "Proprietary/Confidential Information", "OSP Section", "Certification/Signatures" Section when ApprovedByUniversityResearchAdministrator= READYFORAPPROVAL;

Match.AttributeValue: Conflict of Interest and Commitment Information

Rule.Description: "University Research Administrator" cann't edit Appendices when ApprovedByUniversityResearchAdministrator= READYFORAPPROVAL;

"University Research Administrator" can "View" "Investigator Information", "Project Information", "Sponsor and Budget Information", "Cost Share Information", "University Commitments", "Conflict of Interest and Commitment Information", "Compliance Information", "Additional Information", "Collaboration Information", "Proprietary/Confidential Information", "Certification/Signatures", "OSP Section", "Appendices" section;

Match.AttributeValue: Conflict of Interest and Commitment Information

Rule.Description: "University Research Director" can edit "Certification/Signatures" and "OSP Section" when ApprovedByUniversityResearchDirector= READYFORAPPROVAL;

"University Research Administrator" cann't "Edit" "Investigator Information", "Project Information", "Sponsor and Budget Information", "Cost Share Information", "University Commitments", "Conflict of Interest and Commitment Information", "Compliance Information", "Additional Information", "Collaboration Information", "Proprietary/Confidential Information" "Appendices"Section when ApprovedByUniversityResearchDirector= READYFORAPPROVAL;

Match.AttributeValue: Conflict of Interest and Commitment Information

Rule.Description: "PI" can "Submit" a "Whole Proposal" when SubmittedByPI = NOTSUBMITTED and ReadyForSubmissionByPI = True and DeletedByPI = NOTDELETED;
